firas, to get rid of the connection blocked remove plugins go to the properties of your left for dead 2 shortcut ( if you dont have one make one) and go to target and at the the end of target it should say left4dead2.exe" after the " type -steam with space. after you type -steam apply and hit ok then test to see if it works. Hope that helps.

For those who are crashing try the following:

inside the main folder there's another folder called left4dead2 and inside the left4dead2 folder there's a folder called addons, rename this addons folder to whatever name you like, this crash problem is known by incompatible addons or plugins, simple rename the addons folder and try again, another possible cause for the crash is the path that the game was installed, since our installers dont change anything in the windows registry you must install it in a short path like C:/games/ or whatever drive letter you may have. try these steps and post the result here please, we will be glad to help you out.

cheers

Ok just an FYI for those who dont understand about how this game is packed. This is NOT an .ISO copy of the game install CD. This is a HEAVILY compressed package of the game files after they have already been installed. If you have fast internet but only a so-so computer DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS TORRENT!!!! IT is a WASTE of your time. On an older computer or one that is a "bargain" type, it will take FAR LONGER to decompress all the files so the game can run than it will to download the game. Just a warning for those not familiar with these types of files.
